item.title: FeaturedWriting effective tools for agents — with agentsAgents are only as effective as the tools we give them. We share how to write high-quality tools and evaluations, and how you can boost performance by using Claude to optimize its tools for itself.
item.description: FeaturedWriting effective tools for agents — with agentsAgents are only as effective as the tools we give them. We share how to write high-quality tools and evaluations, and how you can boost performance by using Claude to optimize its tools for itself.
